official-title.#text:
To authorize the President to extend the term of the
		  Agreement for Cooperation between the Government of the United States of
		  America and the Government of the Republic of Korea Concerning Civil Uses of
		  Nuclear Energy for a period not to exceed March 19, 2016.

header.#text:
Authority to extend the
			 United States-Republic of Korea Nuclear Cooperation Agreement

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2449 IH: To authorize the President to extend the term of the Agreement for Cooperation between the Government of the United States of America and the Government of the Republic of Korea Concerning Civil Uses of Nuclear Energy for a period not to exceed March 19, 2016.
